@graph.headline: Want to Upsell on Shopify and Actually Make More Money?
@graph.description: Learn how to effectively upsell on Shopify by installing upsell apps, creating compelling offers, and implementing proven strategies to increase average order value and customer lifetime value.

@graph.name: How to Upsell on Shopify
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to implementing upselling strategies on your Shopify store

supply.name: Upsell App from Shopify App Store

step.name: Install an Upsell App
step.text: First install an upsell app from the Shopify App Store. This is non-negotiable for effective upselling.

step.name: Create Specific Offers
step.text: Create actual offers that suggest a better, pricier product upgrade with clear value proposition.

step.name: Display Offers Strategically
step.text: Display these offers on product pages, in the cart, or at checkout for maximum visibility.

step.name: Implement Post-Purchase Upsells
step.text: Present post-purchase upsells on the thank you page for one-click acceptance.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify Upselling
hasDefinedTerm.description: A sales strategy used on Shopify stores to encourage customers to purchase a more expensive version of a product they're already considering

hasDefinedTerm.name: Average Order Value (AOV)
hasDefinedTerm.description: The average dollar amount spent each time a customer places an order on a website or mobile app

hasDefinedTerm.name: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
hasDefinedTerm.description: The total worth to a business of a customer over the whole period of their relationship

hasDefinedTerm.name: Cross-selling
hasDefinedTerm.description: A sales technique involving the selling of an additional product or service to an existing customer

hasDefinedTerm.name: Post-Purchase Upsells
hasDefinedTerm.description: Sales offers presented to customers after they have completed their initial purchase, typically on thank you pages

hasDefinedTerm.name: Pre-Purchase Upsells
hasDefinedTerm.description: Sales offers presented to customers before they complete their purchase, such as on product pages or in the cart

hasDefinedTerm.name: Upsell Apps
hasDefinedTerm.description: Shopify applications designed to create and manage upselling campaigns and offers

hasDefinedTerm.name: Down-selling
hasDefinedTerm.description: A sales technique where a less expensive alternative is offered when a customer hesitates due to price

@graph.name: Proven Upselling Tactics for Shopify

itemListElement.name: Use Dedicated Upsell Apps
itemListElement.description: Install specialized apps from the Shopify App Store to create custom upsell funnels and A/B test offers

itemListElement.name: Create Relevant and Valuable Offers
itemListElement.description: Ensure upsell offers are directly related to the customer's current selection and provide clear additional value
